EmailTemplate.subject: Want Self-Managing Kubernetes? Would you invest 60 minutes?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo-kubernetes]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Great meeting you at KubeCon and hope you enjoyed the T-shirt!
We had a brief amount of time to discuss what self-managing Kubernetes means, so we’re wondering if you’d like to see how Turbonomic’s full-stack optimization works in your own environment. Below is an overview of what you can expect from a 1-hour call, and we are always happy to tailor it to fit your specific needs.
Schedule My Personalized Demo <[[https://turbonomic.com/request-a-demo-kubernetes]]>
Cheers,
Eva, Endre, Enlin, and Asena
The KubeTurbonauts
------------------------
Interested in a demo? Here's what we'll cover:
Step 1 (10-15 minutes)—Intro & Overview
- Introductions
- Quick overview of Turbonomic’s Analytics Engine (if you need it)
- Discussion of your specific business requirements
Step 2 (15 minutes)—Deploy Turbonomic
- Deploy Turbonomic (as “read-only”) into your environment
- Within a few minutes you’ll see your full stack—from Kubernetes through the underlying infrastructure—as well as specific optimization actions.
Step 3 (30 minutes)—Discuss Optimization Actions
- Review actions that are optimizing for performance, compliance, and cost.
- Action types include: pod rescheduling, container resizing, and/or cluster scaling, as well as actions to optimize your AWS, Azure, or on-prem environment.
- Discuss next steps automating actions and/or expanding scope.
Not ready for a demo? Learn more about how we are optimizing container platforms here <[[https://turbonomic.com/solutions/container-platforms/]]>.
